name: Cyberpunk 2021 (Mikel Román)
description:
·This is a game i made for a school project back in January 2021, the theme of the exercise was to make a FPS game, so, as i recently was playing Cyberpunk 2077 and i was loving it, i decided to make my version of it! x)

·The game is ultra-bad optimized for what it is, i went crazy with Unity HDRP, my condolences (GTX 1060+ at 1080p should be good)

·The story is that you are the only person in space and you need to to destroy the Arasaka base. They want to expand their empire throughout the universe and your goal is to stop them.

·Hope you enjoy it!
